title: Job-Tailored Foreign Language Education Workshop: Practical Competency Enhancement Through Workshop-Based Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Basic foreign language proficiency and understanding of job-related terminology
context.additional_context: A course focusing on foreign language communication skills immediately applicable to work environments for medical/legal/technical professionals

learning_goals: Learners can appropriately utilize 500 job-specific technical terms in context through workshop practical activities.
Learners can naturally use work-related conversational expressions (e.g., meetings, negotiations, presentations) through online discussions and role-playing.
Learners can improve communication errors by over 70% through peer assessment exchanges while writing feedback reports.

resources: LMS Platform (Integrated with Video Conferencing Tools, Real-Time Chat, and Assignment Submission System)
Job-Specific Customizable Worksheets and Scenario Templates

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
